attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For over 50 years the great British  actor George Cole has entertained millions with his acting genius.
His work spans many classic  films to great tv series such as Minder that are now a much loved part of British tv history due in no small part to his ability to portray  character so brilliantly. 
It's time his contribution was  properly recognised, it's long overdue.
